lead_paragraph: Levine, the team’s president, said that he was not frustrated with its performance and that there was a lot of baseball still to be played.

headline.print_headline: Official Has Strong Words for Media, Not Team
headline.main: Randy Levine Has Strong Words for Reporters, Not Yankees

snippet: Levine, the team’s president, said that he was not frustrated with its performance and that there was a lot of baseball still to be played.
abstract: New York Yankees president Randy Levine pushes back against media questions about team's performance and upcoming trade deadline.
